title: New WUSIC App Announces War on Walmart
text:
New WUSIC App Announces War on Walmart C2B Platform Disrupting Big Box Stores: Consumers Buy Directly from Factories September 29, 2015 08:30 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
SAN FRANCISCO--( BUSINESS WIRE )--In 2015, analysts at Goldman Sachs wrote that “shoppers are increasingly turning to the Web ... cutting into the market share of big-box retailers like Walmart and Target.” 
Featured as one of the Best Startups at TechCrunch Disrupt SF September 21-23, 2015. https://youtu.be/fd0Ypg4BUNI 
WUSIC has plans to further disrupt the global, multi-trillion dollar industry. “With this new platform -- integrated into the entire Alibaba catalog of products -- we hope to disrupt the big box model at its core,” said Bruce Wong, Founder of WUSIC. “If consumers want to take advantage of huge savings, we need to invent a platform that allows consumers to aggregate demand and purchase directly from factories, disrupting the middle man in a new kind of revolutionary model.” 
WUSIC is a new Consumer-to-Business (C2B) platform, allowing consumers to go straight to the manufacturer for the largest savings possible. The C2B business model completely transposes the traditional business-to-consumer (B2C) model, where a business produces product and then looks to market and build consumer demand. In this case, consumer demand dictates supply quantity and price directly from the manufacturer. 
According to Bruce, it’s all about cutting out the go-between while the manufacturer is still able to create mass quantities at mass quantity prices. 
Consumers create their own wish list of items -- or search from tens of millions of catalogs from Alibaba’s global factories, and are notified when the deal is in-effect. See something you want? Wish for it on WUSIC. Share and spread the wish via social media to “rock” for mass savings. Once a wish list for a specific product hits the minimum quantity required by manufacturers, WUSIC goes straight to the manufacturer to work out a deal at incredible prices. 
Getting Back 1% 
For additional savings, consumers have the option of sharing their referral code to earn a 1% kickback from WUSIC on all future purchases. These credits can then be used on their own future purchases.
